trends: There have been 128 other sightings in Fort Worth
There were no other sightings in Fort Worth on or around September 10th 2011
divs: sighting detailsat about 11pm, saturday, september 10, i saw several (maybe 10), fire\flame like objects in the sky. when i first noticed them, there were maybe 4 or 5, almost stationary. then i saw that they were moving, very slowly. more appeared. they would rise, one by one, from the ssw and move northward until they dissapated\faded. i live near a jrb and i can recognize jets, commercial planes, fireworks, blimps and weather balloons, day or night. these were none of those. the objects seemed to be about a quarter the size of the moon, but it was difficult to judge the true size or distance. they appeared much like actual flames in the sky, almost like the holiday lights covered by paper sacks people place along their sidewalks during the holidays. a neighbor a block away called me stating he saw them too. we can't seem to find any evidence anyone else saw these things! if anybody else saw this, please say something. it's frustrating and a little scary. the neighbor and i took some pictures with our phones but, they don't seem tobe very good.
